pkgmetadata.longdescription: Penalized Regression Calibration (PRC) for the Dynamic Prediction of Survival // Computes penalized regression calibration (PRC), a statistical method for the dynamic prediction of survival when many longitudinal predictors are available. See Signorelli (2024) doi:10.32614/RJ-2024-014 and Signorelli et al. (2021) doi:10.1002/sim.9178 for details.
